product_name: Tifosi Radius Polarized Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: TheTifosi Radius Polarized FototecTM Photochromic sunglasses cut the glare while adding versatility; variable tint has you covered whether on the snow, the water, or the road to your adventure.
